cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 1 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

privates.name: Standard Single Private Ensuite
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription: Ensuite, shower, hair dryer, tea/coffee, TV, heaters, off street parking, log fire lounge and Includes Breakfast, public wireles internet available

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Ensuite, shower, tea/coffee, heaters, electric blanket, Tv, clock radio,continetal b/f, off street parking,public wireless internet available an extra cost.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 18th Oct 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 18th Oct 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
